alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Buckeye, Avondale; East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 25 at 9:58AM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one mile in patchy dense fog. * WHERE...Northwest Pinal County, Superior, Southeast Valley/Queen Creek, South Mountain/Ahwatukee, Buckeye/Avondale, Apache Junction/Gold Canyon, West Pinal County, Sonoran Desert National Monument and The East Valley of the Phoenix Metro Area. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. Affected roadways include, but are not limited to, the San Tan Freeway, South Mountain Freeway, Hunt Highway, and Highway 347.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Buckeye, Avondale; East Valley; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Southeast Valley, Queen Creek; Superior; West Pinal County
